availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander L. Davidson (Morgan County, KY, state senator)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, state senator. Virginia native. Married to Lucinda Walsh Davidson in Morgan County, Kentucky on July 21, 1857. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 554.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000216835, p. 26.
Find A Grave, "A. L. Davidson (1827-1911)," Memorial #122743960, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/122743960 (accessed April 15, 2020).
